title: ward skin unlocked but dissapeared
body: hello, Riot support... just reached level 25, got a caprule, opened it, got inside Zed shard and a ward skin. The Zed shard is still there, but the ward skin (tomb figure) is gone. Can you please restore it?

replies.body: That Tomb Angel ward skin was automatically added to your account and didn't go into your loot ^_^. If you enter into a custom game really quick you should be able to pick it next to your summoner spells!
thank you friend... already discovered it, and dont know how to delete the thread...
